Author: katiegoodluck
Text: Eek! I've been somewhat restricting but still eating so that's definitely what's done it.  Unfortunately it's 10pm and there's no pharmacys open so I can cant get anything to help. This is the third bad poo I've been stuck in the toilet with in the last few hours :s  The alcohol definitely isn't helping but I'm also definitely not going to stop, so it's going to be an interesting night.  Thank you though!

Author: dino_bones72
Text: Have you been restricting hard or fasting for the last few days? If your gallbladder is still producing bile but there's nothing in your stomach for it to do anything with then you can shart (I've been there. In the office. Twice. Not fun)  Take some immodium (or whatever its called where you are - Wikipedia is good for listing the alternative names around the world). Take a dose or 2, I would recommend putting a little something in your tummy and going easy on the alcohol  Honestly, the times it happened to me it was a once and done stealth attack, not a recurring event over the day
